title: Mr Boukadoum calls for immediate cessation of Zionist assault on Palestinians
text: Minister of Foreign Affairs, Mr Sabri Bukadoum, urged Thursday in New York all the active forces to combine efforts for the "immediate cessation of the Zionist assault" on the occupied Palestinian territories.

"The Arab Group said that the gravity of the situation requires from all the active force to combine efforts for the immediate cessation of the aggression and the rapid handling of the catastrophic humanitarian crisis throughout the Palestinian occupied territories and to bring together the climate and conditions favorable to the resumption of the peace process," Mr Boukadoum said in a speech on behalf of the Arab Group at the United Nations (chaired by Algeria during the month of May).
The UN General Assembly held an emergency meeting on the situation in the Middle East and the Palestinian cause.

In the face of the Security Council's failure to take a clear stand on the Zionist aggression against the defenseless Palestinians, Algeria, on behalf of the Arab Group, and Niger, on behalf of the Organization of Islamic Cooperation (OIC), called for a meeting of the General Assembly with a view to bringing the United Nations to assume its responsibility to put an end to the aggressions committed by the occupying forces against the Palestinians and use all available means to protect them and their holy places.
